CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: stone dart
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: A sharpened stone is attached as a dart tip. Digs into exposed tissue fairly well but is ineffective against any kind of armor.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: steel dart
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: The dart tip is made from steel to enhance armor penetration.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: plasteel dart
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Fitted with a plasteel tip to maximize armor penetration.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: stone narcotic dart
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: A sharpened stone is attached as a dart tip, coated with yokai narcotic poison. Digs into exposed tissue fairly well but is ineffective against any kind of armor.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: steel narcotic dart
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: The dart tip is made from steel to enhance armor penetration, and coated with yokai narcotic poison.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: plasteel narcotic dart
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Fitted with a plasteel tip to maximize armor penetration, and coated in yokai narcotic poison.
